content.en: Database optimization: Researchers have developed algorithms to address various challenges in database systems. These algorithms aim to resolve data conflicts, prevent deadlock and livelock problems, improve concurrency control, and increase system efficiency. They attribute agency to the algorithms, stating that they can effectively resolve conflicts, prevent problems, improve scheduling, and satisfy timing and security requirements in real-time database systems.
content.da: Databaseoptimering: Forskere har udviklet algoritmer til at tackle forskellige udfordringer i databasesystemer. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at løse datakonflikter, forhindre deadlock- og livelock-problemer, forbedre samtidighedskontrol og øge systemeffektiviteten. De tilskriver algoritmerne evnen til effektivt at løse konflikter, forhindre problemer, forbedre planlægning og opfylde tidsmæssige og sikkerhedsmæssige krav i realtidsdatabasesystemer.
